textBeforeTable: Wave 1 (2006) [See Wave 2 version below] The next questions are about your opinions on social and political issues. For each statement, please indicate whether you strongly disagree, somewhat disagree, neither agree nor disagree, somewhat agree, or strongly agree. The only legal marriage should be a marriage between one man and one woman. (AMA1W1) -- LOWEIGHT   All frequencies weighted by Moral and Political Attitudes Results & Summaries The PALS seeks to understand the impact of religion in everyday life, and ultimately the connections between religious change and other forms of change among diverse individuals and families over the course of their lives.
